channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【C++/WinRT implementation inheritance: Notes on winrt::implements, part 7】C ++/WINRT实施继承：Winrt ::的注释，第7部分
item.description: 【Inheritance without involving winrt::implements at all.】继承根本不涉及winrt ::实施。

item.title: 【Powerful Devs Hack Together 2025 Wrap Up】功能强大的开发人员将2025总结在一起
item.description: 【We're almost at the finish line! Our Powerful Devs Hack Together is coming to a close and we encourage you to continue with your AI journey.】我们几乎处于终点线！我们强大的开发人员骇客即将结束，我们鼓励您继续进行AI之旅。

item.title: 【Microsoft Update changes for PowerShell 7】Microsoft更新PowerShell 7
item.description: 【This blog outlines the expected behavior of MU releases for PowerShell 7.】该博客概述了PowerShell 7的MU发布的预期行为。

item.title: 【Azure SDK Release (February 2025)】Azure SDK发布（2025年2月）
item.description: 【Azure SDK releases every month. In this post, you find this month's highlights and release notes.】Azure SDK每月发布。在这篇文章中，您可以找到本月的亮点和发行说明。

item.title: 【Multi-Provider Strategy for App Configuration in Python】python中应用程序配置的多程序策略
item.description: 【This post discusses a strategy for creating a custom extensible configuration module in python projects.】这篇文章讨论了在Python项目中创建自定义可扩展配置模块的策略。

item.title: 【Terminal Chat now included in GitHub Copilot Free】github copilot中现在包含的终端聊天免费
item.description: 【Windows Terminal Canary users can now use Terminal Chat with the GitHub Copilot Free plan! 🚀 GitHub Copilot Free is limited to 50 chat messages per month. This includes the usage of Copilot in the CLI, VS Code, and Visual Studio. If you reach your quota, you can upgrade on the web. You can sign […]】Windows Terminal Canary用户现在可以使用GitHub Copilot免费计划使用终端聊天！ 🚀GitHub Copilot Free每月限制为50个聊天消息。这包括在CLI，VS代码和Visual Studio中使用Copilot。如果您达到配额，则可以在网络上升级。您可以签署[…]

item.title: 【Using Powershell7 with Managed Runcommand】将PowerShell7与托管runco​​mmand一起使用
item.description: 【Today, all scripts run through Managed RunCommand will by default use Powershell 5. What if you have a script that requires Powershell7? This is supported via a new feature, but you will need to specify the different script shell. Here’s what you need to do. Ensure your VM has Powershell7 Powershell7 is not installed by […]】如今，所有脚本都通过托管RunCommand运行的所有脚本将默认使用PowerShell 5。如果您有一个需要PowerShell7的脚本，该怎么办？这是通过新功能支持的，但是您需要指定不同的脚本外壳。这是您需要做的。确保您的VM具有powerShell7 PowerShell7未安装[…]

item.title: 【Catch issues before you commit to Git】在您承诺git之前捕获问题
item.description: 【Discovering issues with code changes after committing changes can be frustrating. Fortunately, Visual Studio offers a new feature that helps you catch potential problems early, improving your code quality. Visual Studio now includes a feature powered by GitHub Copilot that lets you review your local code changes before committing them, before they are part of […]】在进行更改后发现代码更改的问题可能会令人沮丧。幸运的是，Visual Studio提供了一项新功能，可帮助您尽早发现潜在问题，从而提高代码质量。 Visual Studio现在包括一个由GitHub Copilot提供动力的功能，可让您在提交之前查看本地代码更改，然后才是[…]的一部分。

item.title: 【What’s New in vcpkg (February 2025): Package installation performance, new tested triplet, and more】VCPKG的新功能（2025年2月）：包装安装性能，新测试的三胞胎等等
item.description: 【This blog post summarizes changes to the vcpkg package manager as part of the 2025.02.14 registry release, 2025-02-11, 2025-01-29, 2025-01-24, and 2025-01-20 tool releases, as well as changes to vcpkg documentation throughout February. This release includes significant performance improvements when installing packages, a new tested triplet (x64-windows-release), an overhaul of how vcpkg handles some downloads […]】这篇博客文章总结了VCPKG软件包管理器的更改，作为2025.02.14注册表版本的一部分，即2025-02-11，2025-01-29，2025-01-24和2025-01-20工具释放，以及在整个2月2月的VCPKG文档中更改。该版本包括安装软件包，新测试的三重态（X64-Windows-Release）时的性能改进，对VCPKG如何处理某些下载[…]的大修进行了大修。

item.title: 【Dev Proxy v0.25, now available, with automatic shut down and simplified configuration management】开发代理V0.25，现在可用，自动关闭并简化配置管理
item.description: 【Read more about the latest Dev Proxy release featuring significant improvements to configuration management, plugin support, and usability.】阅读有关最新开发代理版本的更多信息，该版本具有对配置管理，插件支持和可用性的重大改进。
